Author: bir_die
Text: I’m not gonna lie, I think this is a great idea. Much better than asking random people. It basically gives you the chance to decide for yourself, which is, honestly, what it comes down to. Or a professional, obviously.

Author: SemicolonButterfly
Text: When the truth feels like faking and lying feels like the truth. Yup, I relate to these fun times.   (I totally used to change the answers on the WHO online alcoholism assessment until it stopped coming back with “get your ass some help”. But how I felt about the truth didn’t make it any less true...in the end.)
